columns.Captain_ID: A unique identifier for each captain in the database.
columns.Name: The full name of the captain.
columns.Ship_ID: A reference to the specific ship that the captain is assigned to.
columns.Class: The classification or type of the ship commanded by the captain.
columns.Rank: The rank or title held by the captain in naval hierarchy.

captain.table_description: The 'captain' table stores information about various ship captains, including their identities, ranks, ages, and the ships they command, facilitating the management and organization of ship personnel.

columns.Ship_ID: A unique identifier for each ship in the table.
columns.Name: The name of the ship, often used for identification and recognition.
columns.Type: The classification of the ship based on its design and operational purpose.
columns.Built_Year: The year in which the ship was constructed.
columns.Class: The classification or standard to which the ship adheres, often related to safety and performance.
columns.Flag: The country under whose laws the ship is registered.

Ship.table_description: The Ship table contains information about various ships, including their identifiers, names, types, construction years, classifications, and registration flags.
